api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Iterable API Key. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Iterable, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.  All data generated after this date will be replicated.

users_sync_interval.title: Users Sync Interval
users_sync_interval.description: The size of the time window (ISO8601 duration) for the users export stream. Smaller values reduce the risk of timeouts for accounts with large numbers of users. Default is P90D (90 days). Examples: PT1H (1 hour), P1D (1 day), P7D (7 days), P30D (30 days), P90D (90 days).
